# BlackRoad OS - Pricing & Packaging Strategy

**Complete pricing tiers, add-ons, and packaging options**
**Generated by:** Copernicus (copywriting specialist)
**Date:** January 4, 2026

---

# Pricing Philosophy

BlackRoad OS pricing is designed around three principles:

1. **Fair Value:** Pay for what you use, scale as you grow
2. **Transparent Costs:** No hidden fees, clear pricing structure
3. **Aligned Incentives:** We succeed when you succeed

---

# Core Platform Pricing

## Developer (Free Forever)

**Perfect for:** Learning, prototyping, open-source projects

### Included:
- ✅ Up to 10 concurrent agents
- ✅ Lucidia domain agents (rate-limited)
- ✅ Basic Prism Console access
- ✅ Community support (Discord, forums)
- ✅ Public GitHub repositories only
- ✅ Standard audit trails (30-day retention)
- ✅ PS-SHA-∞ identity chains (basic)
- ✅ 1 GB RoadChain storage
- ✅ API rate limit: 1,000 requests/day

### Limitations:
- ❌ No SLA guarantee
- ❌ No HIPAA/SOC 2 compliance
- ❌ No dedicated support
- ❌ No on-premise deployment
- ❌ No custom integrations

**Price:** **$0/month**

**Best For:**
- Students and educators
- Open-source contributors
- Proof-of-concept development
- Learning BlackRoad OS

---

## Professional ($499/month)

**Perfect for:** Growing teams, production deployments, startups

### Everything in Developer, plus:
- ✅ Up to 1,000 concurrent agents
- ✅ Full Lucidia domain agent access (unlimited)
- ✅ Advanced Prism Console (all features)
- ✅ Email & chat support (24-hour response)
- ✅ Private repositories
- ✅ Extended audit trails (2-year retention)
- ✅ 100 GB RoadChain storage
- ✅ API rate limit: 10,000 requests/day
- ✅ 99.5% uptime SLA
- ✅ Weekly backup and disaster recovery
- ✅ Basic compliance reporting (SOC 2 ready)
- ✅ Lucidia workflow scheduler
- ✅ Custom domain support
- ✅ 5 team members included

### Add-Ons Available:
- Additional team members: $50/user/month
- Extra RoadChain storage: $10/100GB/month
- Priority support upgrade: $200/month

**Price:** **$499/month** (annual: $4,990/year - save 2 months)

**Best For:**
- SaaS startups scaling to production
- Mid-sized companies deploying AI
- Development agencies building for clients
- Research institutions

---

## Enterprise (Custom Pricing)

**Perfect for:** Regulated industries, large-scale deployments, Fortune 500

### Everything in Professional, plus:
- ✅ 30,000+ concurrent agents (unlimited)
- ✅ Dedicated infrastructure (VPC isolation)
- ✅ 24/7 phone & Slack support (1-hour response)
- ✅ Unlimited team members
- ✅ HIPAA/SOC 2/FedRAMP compliance packages
- ✅ On-premise deployment option
- ✅ Custom SLA (up to 99.99%)
- ✅ Unlimited RoadChain storage (7+ year retention)
- ✅ Unlimited API requests
- ✅ Custom integrations and connectors
- ✅ Dedicated customer success manager
- ✅ Architecture consulting (10 hours/month)
- ✅ White-glove onboarding
- ✅ Custom contract terms
- ✅ Multi-region deployment
- ✅ Advanced security features (SSO, SAML, SCIM)

### Enterprise Services:
- Annual health check and optimization
- Quarterly business reviews
- Priority feature requests
- Beta access to new features
- Custom training programs
- Incident post-mortems

**Price:** **Starting at $5,000/month**

**Typical Enterprise Pricing:**
- **Small Enterprise (1K-5K agents):** $5,000 - $12,000/month
- **Medium Enterprise (5K-15K agents):** $12,000 - $30,000/month
- **Large Enterprise (15K-30K+ agents):** $30,000 - $100,000/month

**Best For:**
- Financial services (banks, hedge funds, fintechs)
- Healthcare systems and pharmaceutical companies
- Government agencies and contractors
- Large enterprises in regulated industries

---

# Product-Specific Pricing

## ALICE QI (Standalone)

For customers who only need deterministic reasoning without full BlackRoad OS platform.

### Starter ($299/month)
- 10,000 API calls/month
- Email support
- Basic analytics dashboard
- 30-day audit trail retention

### Growth ($999/month)
- 100,000 API calls/month
- Chat support
- Advanced analytics
- 1-year audit trail retention
- Custom models (beta)

### Enterprise (Custom)
- Unlimited API calls
- Dedicated infrastructure
- 24/7 support
- 7+ year retention
- Custom model training

**Add-Ons:**
- Overage: $0.05/call beyond tier limit
- Custom models: $5,000 setup + $500/month

---

## Lucidia (Standalone API)

For customers who want orchestration without full platform.

### Hobbyist ($49/month)
- 1,000 workflow executions/month
- All 10 domain agents
- Community support
- Public workflows only

### Professional ($199/month)
- 10,000 workflow executions/month
- Private workflows
- Email support
- Workflow analytics
- Custom agent seeds

### Enterprise (Custom)
- Unlimited executions
- Dedicated agents
- 24/7 support
- Custom domain agents: $2,000 setup + $500/month/agent

**Add-Ons:**
- Overage: $0.02/execution beyond tier limit
- Custom domain agent development: Contact sales

---

## Prism Console (Add-On)

Available as add-on to Professional tier (included in Enterprise).

**Professional Add-On:** $200/month
- Full dashboard access
- Real-time monitoring
- Policy enforcement
- Job scheduling
- Basic analytics

**Advanced Analytics Module:** $300/month
- Anomaly detection
- Cohort analysis
- Decision automation
- Executive reporting

---

# Compliance Packages

## HIPAA Compliance Pack

**Price:** $1,000/month (requires Professional or Enterprise)

### Included:
- ✅ Business Associate Agreement (BAA)
- ✅ Encrypted data at rest and in transit
- ✅ Consent management system
- ✅ Automated compliance reporting
- ✅ HIPAA audit trail (7-year retention)
- ✅ Access logs and monitoring
- ✅ Incident response plan
- ✅ Annual HIPAA risk assessment

---

## SOC 2 Compliance Pack

**Price:** $800/month (requires Professional or Enterprise)

### Included:
- ✅ SOC 2 Type II controls
- ✅ Automated evidence collection
- ✅ Quarterly compliance reports
- ✅ Vendor questionnaire automation
- ✅ Change management logs
- ✅ Security monitoring
- ✅ Annual SOC 2 audit support

---

## FedRAMP Compliance Pack

**Price:** Custom (Enterprise only)

### Included:
- ✅ FedRAMP Moderate controls
- ✅ Continuous monitoring
- ✅ Authorization package support
- ✅ Government-specific deployment
- ✅ FISMA compliance
- ✅ Dedicated compliance team

---

# Infrastructure Add-Ons

## Dedicated Edge Devices

Deploy BlackRoad OS agents to dedicated edge hardware.

### Raspberry Pi Deployment
**Hardware Cost:** $300/device (one-time)
**Management Fee:** $200/month/device

### Includes:
- Pre-configured Raspberry Pi 5 (8GB)
- BlackRoad OS pre-installed
- Remote management via Prism Console
- Automatic updates
- Hardware warranty (1 year)

### Industrial Edge (Jetson Orin Nano)
**Hardware Cost:** $500/device (one-time)
**Management Fee:** $350/month/device

### Includes:
- NVIDIA Jetson Orin Nano
- GPU-accelerated AI inference
- Industrial enclosure
- 24/7 monitoring
- 3-year warranty

---

## Multi-Region Deployment

Deploy agents across multiple geographic regions for latency optimization.

**Price:** $500/region/month (Enterprise only)

### Available Regions:
- US East (Virginia)
- US West (California)
- Europe (Frankfurt)
- Asia Pacific (Singapore)
- UK (London)

### Includes:
- Regional data residency
- Cross-region replication
- Automatic failover
- <50ms global latency

---

## Custom Integrations

Need to connect BlackRoad OS to proprietary systems?

**Setup Fee:** $5,000 - $25,000 (one-time)
**Maintenance:** $500/month/integration

### Examples:
- Legacy ERP systems (SAP, Oracle, JDE)
- Custom databases and APIs
- Proprietary protocols
- On-premise software

---

# Support Tiers

## Community Support (Free)
- Discord community
- Documentation and guides
- GitHub issues
- Best-effort response

## Email & Chat Support (Professional)
- Included with Professional tier
- 24-hour response time
- Business hours only (M-F 9am-5pm PT)
- Unlimited tickets

## Priority Support ($200/month add-on)
- 4-hour response time
- Extended hours (7am-9pm PT, M-F)
- Slack channel access
- Phone support for critical issues

## Enterprise Support (Enterprise tier)
- Included with Enterprise tier
- 1-hour response time (24/7)
- Dedicated Slack channel
- Phone support anytime
- Assigned customer success manager
- Escalation to engineering team

---

# Volume Discounts

## Annual Commitment Discount
- **12-month prepay:** Save 2 months (17% discount)
- **24-month prepay:** Save 5 months (21% discount)
- **36-month prepay:** Save 8 months (22% discount)

## Multi-Product Bundles
- **Platform + ALICE QI:** Save 15%
- **Platform + Lucidia + ALICE QI:** Save 20%
- **Platform + All Add-Ons:** Save 25%

## Nonprofit & Education Discount
- **Nonprofits (501c3):** 30% discount
- **Educational Institutions:** 40% discount
- **Students/Teachers (personal):** 50% discount
- **Open Source Projects:** 60% discount

# Pricing Calculators

## Estimate Your Monthly Cost

### Example 1: Startup SaaS Company
**Profile:**
- 500 active agents
- Standard compliance needs
- 5 team members
- 50K API calls/day

**Recommended Tier:** Professional
**Base Price:** $499/month
**Add-Ons:** None needed
**Total:** **$499/month**

---

### Example 2: Mid-Size Fintech
**Profile:**
- 5,000 active agents
- SOC 2 compliance required
- 25 team members
- 500K API calls/day
- ALICE QI integration

**Recommended Tier:** Enterprise (Small)
**Base Price:** $8,000/month
**Add-Ons:**
- SOC 2 Pack: $800/month
- 20 extra team members: $1,000/month (@ $50 each)
**Total:** **$9,800/month**

**Annual Prepay:** $98,000/year → **$81,700/year** (17% savings)

---

### Example 3: Large Healthcare System
**Profile:**
- 20,000 active agents across 450 hospitals
- HIPAA compliance mandatory
- 150 team members
- 5M API calls/day
- Multi-region deployment (US East, US West)
- Custom EHR integration

**Recommended Tier:** Enterprise (Large)
**Base Price:** $50,000/month
**Add-Ons:**
- HIPAA Pack: $1,000/month
- Extra regions (1): $500/month
- Custom integration: $10,000 setup + $500/month

**Setup Costs:** $10,000 (one-time)
**Monthly Recurring:** **$52,000/month**

**Annual Contract:** $624,000/year + $10K setup = **$634,000 total first year**

**ROI:** $15M savings in compliance costs + $42M revenue increase = **2,600% ROI**

# Payment Terms

## Payment Methods
- Credit card (Visa, Mastercard, Amex)
- ACH/Wire transfer (Enterprise only)
- Purchase order (Enterprise, net 30)

## Billing Cycles
- Monthly (default)
- Annual (prepay with discount)
- Quarterly (Enterprise only)

## Refund Policy
- **Free tier:** N/A
- **Professional:** 30-day money-back guarantee
- **Enterprise:** Custom terms (typically no refunds on annual contracts)

---

# Frequently Asked Questions

### Can I upgrade/downgrade mid-contract?
Yes. Upgrades take effect immediately (prorated). Downgrades take effect at next billing cycle.

### What happens if I exceed my agent limit?
Agents beyond tier limit are auto-paused. Upgrade to resume or contact sales for temporary increase.

### Do you offer trials?
- Free tier is perpetual (no trial needed)
- Professional: 14-day free trial (no credit card required)
- Enterprise: Custom POC engagement (contact sales)

### What's included in "unlimited"?
Enterprise "unlimited" is subject to fair use policy. We've never had a customer exceed reasonable limits.

### Can I bring my own cloud infrastructure?
Yes, for Enterprise tier. We support:
- AWS (your account)
- Google Cloud (your account)
- Azure (your account)
- On-premise (your hardware)

Setup fee: $25,000 + ongoing support costs.

### Do you offer government pricing?
Yes. FedRAMP-compliant deployments available. Contact government@blackroad.systems for pricing.

### What about non-production environments?
Professional and Enterprise tiers include:
- 1 production environment
- 1 staging environment (50% of prod agent limit)
- Unlimited development environments (10 agents each)

### Can I pause my subscription?
Yes, for up to 3 months. $50/month maintenance fee to keep data and configurations.

# Competitive Comparison

## BlackRoad OS vs. Competitors

| Feature | BlackRoad OS | OpenAI API | Anthropic Claude | LangChain | Generic Cloud |
|---------|--------------|------------|------------------|-----------|---------------|
| **Deterministic AI** | ✅ Built-in | ❌ Probabilistic | ❌ Probabilistic | ❌ Depends on model | ❌ Depends on model |
| **Audit Trails** | ✅ RoadChain | ❌ None | ❌ None | ❌ DIY | ❌ DIY |
| **Cryptographic Identity** | ✅ PS-SHA-∞ | ❌ None | ❌ None | ❌ None | ❌ DIY |
| **Agent Orchestration** | ✅ 30K agents | ⚠️ Limited | ⚠️ Limited | ⚠️ Framework only | ❌ DIY |
| **HIPAA Compliance** | ✅ Built-in | ⚠️ BAA available | ⚠️ BAA available | ❌ DIY | ❌ DIY |
| **SOC 2 Reports** | ✅ Automated | ❌ None | ❌ None | ❌ None | ❌ DIY |
| **Explainable AI** | ✅ Always | ⚠️ Sometimes | ⚠️ Sometimes | ⚠️ Depends | ⚠️ Depends |
| **On-Premise** | ✅ Yes | ❌ Cloud only | ❌ Cloud only | ✅ Yes | ✅ Yes |
| **Price (Professional)** | $499/mo | ~$1,000+/mo | ~$800+/mo | Free + infra | ~$2,000+/mo |

**BlackRoad OS Advantages:**
- Only platform with built-in compliance and audit trails
- Deterministic reasoning for regulated industries
- Complete agent orchestration (not just LLM API)
- Fixed pricing (not usage-based surprises)
